Package org.traincontrol.marklin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MarklinAccessory
    A marklin switch or signal
    MarklinControlStation
    Main "station" class.
    MarklinFeedback
    Marklin S88 feedback
    MarklinLayout
    Layout container with grid and size info
    MarklinLayoutComponent
    Representation of each layout component as defined by CS2 Contains initial data and references, no actual state
    MarklinLocomotive
    Marklin locomotive that implements CS2 interfaces/protocols
    MarklinRoute
    Simple route representation
    MarklinSimpleComponent
    Serializable class for saving state
